thread.title: Land & Buildings Blasts Management of RLJ Lodging Trust

author: Peter Grant
title: Land & Buildings Blasts Management of RLJ Lodging Trust

organizations.name: land & buildings blasts management of rlj lodging trust when rlj lodging trust

text:
When RLJ Lodging Trust acquired FelCor last year in a $3 billion deal, it gained a new shareholder who has been a thorn in its side ever since.
Jonathan Littâ€™s investment firm, Land & Buildings Investment Management LLC, had been a large shareholder in FelCor, and wound up with about a 2% stake in RLJ in the wake of the all-stock acquisition.
